resources.string:
In Chinacota you will find nice hotels and parks for each of the members of your family and friends.
Being such a tourist place you will have a lodging with an excellent service and availability for provide you with the best comfort and enjoy your vacation with a lodging made for you.

In Chinacota you will find new experiences with your palate because you have to encourage you to try the gastronomic diversity of this beautiful place.
Some of its gastronomic delights are: * Cacaitos chitareros: This is a sweet derived from panela that together with other ingredients form one of the sweets most consumed by the population local.

Welcome to chinacota, a very welcoming town for you and your family, full of many places to know enjoy its climate in the part of head of the town known as iscala, there pordar generated a campsite with your friends and enjoy its green mountains.
